patch_unified:
diff --git a/bin/elasticsearch b/bin/elasticsearch
index 753aa8e..7cca554 100755
--- a/bin/elasticsearch
+++ b/bin/elasticsearch
@@ -170,7 +170,21 @@ while true; do
             shift
         ;;
         -h)
-            echo "Usage: $0 [-d] [-h] [-p pidfile]"
+            echo "Usage: $0 [-d] [-h] [-p pidfile] [--option=value]"
+            echo ""
+            echo "Options:"
+            echo "  -d                    Start in daemon mode"
+            echo "  -h                    Display this help message"
+            echo "  -p <pidfile>          Write PID to specified file"
+            echo "  -v                    Display version information"
+            echo "  -Dproperty=value      Set a Java system property"
+            echo "  -Xproperty=value      Set a non-standard Java option"
+            echo "  --property=value      Set an Elasticsearch property (converted to -Des.property=value)"
+            echo ""
+            echo "Examples:"
+            echo "  $0 --node.name=my-node"
+            echo "  $0 --cluster.name=my-cluster --node.name=node1"
+            echo "  $0 -d -p /var/run/es.pid --node.name=my-node"
             exit 0
         ;;
         -D)
@@ -192,6 +206,31 @@ while true; do
     esac
 done
 
+# Process remaining arguments for long-style options (--property=value)
+while [ "$#" -gt 0 ]; do
+    case $1 in
+        --*=*)
+            # Extract property name and value from --property=value format
+            prop="${1#--}"
+            prop_name="${prop%%=*}"
+            prop_value="${prop#*=}"
+            properties="$properties -Des.$prop_name=$prop_value"
+            shift
+        ;;
+        --*)
+            # Handle --property without value (boolean flag)
+            prop="${1#--}"
+            properties="$properties -Des.$prop=true"
+            shift
+        ;;
+        *)
+            # Pass through any other arguments as-is
+            properties="$properties $1"
+            shift
+        ;;
+    esac
+done
+
 # Start up the service
 launch_service "$pidfile" "$daemonized" "$properties"
 
diff --git a/bin/elasticsearch.bat b/bin/elasticsearch.bat
index 3129171..be7ee45 100644
--- a/bin/elasticsearch.bat
+++ b/bin/elasticsearch.bat
@@ -1,6 +1,11 @@
 @echo off
 
-SETLOCAL
+SETLOCAL ENABLEDELAYEDEXPANSION
+
+REM Check for help option
+if "%~1"=="-h" goto usage
+if "%~1"=="--help" goto usage
+if "%~1"=="/?" goto usage
 
 if NOT DEFINED JAVA_HOME goto err
 
@@ -65,14 +70,56 @@ REM JAVA_OPTS=%JAVA_OPTS% -XX:HeapDumpPath=$ES_HOME/logs/heapdump.hprof
 set ES_CLASSPATH=%ES_CLASSPATH%;%ES_HOME%/lib/${project.build.finalName}.jar;%ES_HOME%/lib/*;%ES_HOME%/lib/sigar/*
 set ES_PARAMS=-Delasticsearch -Des-foreground=yes -Des.path.home="%ES_HOME%"
 
-"%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java" %JAVA_OPTS% %ES_JAVA_OPTS% %ES_PARAMS% %* -cp "%ES_CLASSPATH%" "org.elasticsearch.bootstrap.ElasticSearch"
+REM Process command line arguments to convert long-style options (--property=value) to -Des.property=value
+set ES_PROPERTIES=
+:loop
+if "%~1"=="" goto end_loop
+set arg=%~1
+
+REM Check if argument starts with --
+echo %arg% | findstr /B /C:"--" >nul
+if %errorlevel% equ 0 (
+    REM Remove leading --
+    set prop=%arg:~2%
+    REM Convert --property=value to -Des.property=value
+    set ES_PROPERTIES=%ES_PROPERTIES% -Des.!prop!
+) else (
+    REM Pass through other arguments as-is
+    set ES_PROPERTIES=%ES_PROPERTIES% %arg%
+)
+shift
+goto loop
+:end_loop
+
+"%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java" %JAVA_OPTS% %ES_JAVA_OPTS% %ES_PARAMS% %ES_PROPERTIES% -cp "%ES_CLASSPATH%" "org.elasticsearch.bootstrap.ElasticSearch"
 goto finally
 
 
 :err
 echo JAVA_HOME environment variable must be set!
 pause
+goto finally
 
+:usage
+echo Usage: %~n0 [options]
+echo.
+echo Options:
+echo   -h, --help, /?        Display this help message
+echo   -Dproperty=value      Set a Java system property
+echo   -Xproperty=value      Set a non-standard Java option
+echo   --property=value      Set an Elasticsearch property (converted to -Des.property=value)
+echo.
+echo Environment Variables:
+echo   ES_HEAP_SIZE          Set both min and max heap (e.g., ES_HEAP_SIZE=2g)
+echo   ES_MIN_MEM            Set minimum heap size (default: 256m)
+echo   ES_MAX_MEM            Set maximum heap size (default: 1g)
+echo   ES_JAVA_OPTS          Additional Java options
+echo.
+echo Examples:
+echo   %~n0 --node.name=my-node
+echo   %~n0 --cluster.name=my-cluster --node.name=node1
+echo   %~n0 -Des.node.name=my-node --cluster.name=prod
+goto finally
 
 :finally
